src:
Duet Hamka - Farizi Kalahkan Koleganya di Nongkrong Bareng Aremania
07 Nov 2019, 03:21 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Duet Hamka Hamzah dan Johan Ahmat Farisi terlalu tangguh bagi rekan-rekannya. Ketangguhan duet pemain bertahan Arema FC ini tak bisa diimbangi duet Dendi Santoso-Makan Konate dan Arthur Cunha da Rocha-Dedik Setiawan. Dalam game Tebak Kata, duet Hamka-Farisi meraih poin tiga, sementara dua pasangan lainnya masing-masing mendapat satu dan dua poin.
Game Tebak Kata, yang berlangsung diiringi riuh tawa Aremania ini merupakan bagian acara Nongkrong Bareng Aremania. Acara yang dihelat Shopee ini digelar di Eiskaffee Malang, Rabu (06/11) malam.
Country Brand Manager Shopee, Rezki Yanuar, menyebut bahwa acara ini merupakan bagian dari Shopee 11.11 Big Sale, yang dihelat 31 Oktober lalu.
"Kegiatan 'Nongkrong Bareng Aremania' ini kami tuju sebagai sesi pertemuan interaktif untuk dapat lebih mengenal lebih jauh antara para pemain Arema dan Aremania," tutur Rezki.
Sementara itu, selain dihadiri oleh bintang-bintang Arema, yang juga mengungkap sejumlah rahasia mereka, acara ini juga dihadiri dirigen legendaris Arema, Yosep Elkepet. Dalam kesempatan ini, Kepet -sapaan karib Elkepet- melontarkan pesan kepada Aremania yang relatif lebih muda darinya.
Menurut Kepet, saat ini, perjuangan Arema masih belum usai. Hamka Hamzah dan kawan-kawan masih harus menjalani sejumlah laga berat untuk menuntaskan kompetisi Shopee Liga 1 musim 2019. Karenanya, ia berharap Aremania bisa terus mendukung perjuangan penggawa Arema tanpa kenal lelah.
"Tentu mendukung dengan cara damai. Jangan berbuat yang bisa merugikan tim kesayangan kita semua," tandasnya.

Bagaimana tanggapan pemain Arema soal acara tersebut? Simak di bawah ini.
text:
Hamka Duet - Farizi Defeats Colleagues at Hangout with Aremania
Nov 7 2019, 03:21 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Duet Hamka Hamzah and Johan Ahmat Farisi are too tough for their colleagues. The toughness of the Arema FC defender duet cannot be matched by the duo of Dendi Santoso-Makan Konate and Arthur Cunha da Rocha-Dedik Setiawan. In the game Guess the Word, the Hamka-Farisi duet won three points, while the other two pairs each got one and two points.
Game Guess the Word, which took place accompanied by the boisterous laughter of Aremania is part of the Hangout with Aremania event. The event held by Shopee was held at Eiskaffee Malang, Wednesday (11/06) night.
Shopee's Country Brand Manager, Rezki Yanuar, said that this event was part of Shopee 11.11 Big Sale, which was held on 31 October.
"We aim to hang out with Aremania as an interactive meeting session to get to know more about the Arema and Aremania players," said Rezki.
Meanwhile, besides being attended by Arema stars, who also revealed a number of their secrets, this event was also attended by the legendary conductor Arema, Yosep Elkepet. On this occasion, Kepet - a close greeting from Elkepet - gave a message to Aremania who was relatively younger than him.
According to Kepet, at this time, Arema's struggle was still not over. Hamka Hamzah and his friends still have to undergo a number of tough matches to complete the Shopee League 1 competition in the 2019 season. Therefore, he hopes Aremania can continue to support the struggle of Arema's relentless tireless workers.
"Certainly supporting in a peaceful manner. Do not do anything that can harm our beloved team all," he said.

How did the Arema players respond to the event? See below.
